articles.description: This is a major trial for the rare and debilitating condition IIH that can lead to people, usually women, going blind and suffering disabling daily headaches. There are no current licensed drugs to treat IIH and hence this result is a major step forward for I…
articles.content: A new experiment has discovered that patients suffering from `blinding` headaches known as Idiopathic Intracranial Hypertension (IIH) might be treated with an injectable peptide used to treat type 2 … [+4056 chars]

articles.author: ET HealthWorld
articles.title: Researchers find new strategies to treat Clostridioides difficile infections - ETHealthWorld
articles.description: C. difficile is the leading cause of hospital-acquired infections and a leading cause of antibiotic-associated diarrhoea. Understanding its metabolic mechanisms at a cellular level may be useful for preventing and treating infections: Leo L. Cheng
articles.content: Massachusetts: Researchers at Brigham and Women's Hospital (BWH) and Massachusetts General Hospital (MGH), two of the founding institutions of Mass General Brigham, have discovered the metabolic mech… [+2883 chars]
